Sentence.sentence: Of families earning more than $75,000 a year, 84% say their children have participated in organized sports over the past year, 64% have done volunteer work and 62% have taken lessons in music, dance or art.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Of families earning less than $30,000, 59% of children have done sports, 37% have volunteered and 41 % have taken arts classes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Sports drinks which are often high in sugar and calories made up most of the food and drink deals, with soft drinks and fast food filling out the reminder.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: After sorting the deals by category, they determined that among the 512 brands associated with the athletes, most involve sporting goods, followed closely by food and beverage brands.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Whether it's a sports team or a presidential campaign, everybody relishes having the big momentum, because it makes them harder to stop or change direction.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But the priorities of many undergraduates are with extracurricular activities, playing sports, and partying and socializing.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: a parent, relative, friend, or doctor outside the family, had higher self-esteem, higher grades, and lower substance use than peers whose role models were sports figures, singers, or other media characters.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The purpose of the speech was to encourage the audience of corporate executives and local business owners to support local sports groups.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: To enhance his credibility with the audience, Larry had brought some slides of his family attending sports events
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He hoped that these added effects would encourage his audience to support local sports teams.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: To encourage people to support local sports groups
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: To raise money for a forthcoming local sports event.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They are known to be the style of the sports world
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As you can see, some of the Stray is used for sports fields.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He doesn't like watching sports programs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Less sport, and fewer meetings with peers correlated with lower well-being, as did less time reading print media newspapers and, surprisingly, less time doing homework.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

spine patient outcomes research trial 脊椎患者后果研究试验

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"体育运动"之意。
means: athletics ：集合名词，常指需要体力与技术的sports与games，特指跳高、跑等竞技项目。
sport ：含义比athletics广泛，指各种形式的体育运动，尤指户外的如游泳、钓鱼、划船、登山等运动。
game ：主要指决定胜负的游戏、比赛，通常有一定的规则，参加者必须遵守，如蓝球、足球等。也作"运动会"解。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

Sentence.sentence: A coach may read a sports story for its threat value: he may have to play that team next week.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: Besides the learning of motor skills, what are the other important objectives of youth sport?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 题设

Sentence.sentence: Children typically change rules to find a point where their game is similar to the actual sport but still allows for play at their level.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: First, sport programs can provide youth with opportunities to be physically active, which can lead to improved physical health.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: For busy librarians and educators, finding instructions for projects, activities, sports, and games that children and teens will find interesting is a constant challenge, this guide is a time-saving, one-stop....
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: I guess that there's probably some demanding work schedule, or social anxiety around stepping up to help for an unknown sport.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: I remember back in high school I spent most of my day at school since I also played a team sport.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I'd like some information about your sports center.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: If children often participate in deliberate play or deliberate practice activities, they are more likely to participate in sports during adulthood.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 题设

Sentence.sentence: If you are time poor, you need run for only half the time to get the same benefits as other sports, so perhaps we should all give it/running a try.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: In general, the kind of news which may be expected to give immediate reward are news of crime and corruption, accidents and disasters, sports, social events, and human interest.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: It could be anything―gardening, cooking, music, sports—but whatever it is, make sure it's a relief from daily stress rather than another thing to worry about.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: It didn't take long for Shelly-Ann to realize that sports could be her way out of Waterhouse.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: On what days is the sports center closed?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 听力 题设

Sentence.sentence: Parents should actively urge their children to take advantage of the opportunity to join sports teams.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Second, youth-sport programs have long been considered important to youth's psychosocial development, providing opportunities to learn important life skills such as cooperation, discipline, leadership, and self-control.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Several recent studies examined the role of talent in the sports world.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sports team owners spend millions of dollars attracting top talent.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: The barefoot kid who just a few years previously had been living in poverty, surrounded by criminals and violence, had written a new chapter in the history of sports.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The film club, the travel club and the sports club.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: The man-on-the-street interview is an interview in which a reporter hits the streets with a cameraman to interview people on the sport.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Then what sports are you interested in?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: These activities are regulated by flexible rules adapted from standardized sport rules and are set up by the children or by an involved adult.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: They replaced their beloved old car with expensive new sports cars.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Third, youth-sport programs are critical for the learning of motor skills, these motor skills serve as a foundation for future national sport stars and recreational adult-sport participants.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: TV doesn't take the place of reading for most children; it takes the place of similar sorts of recreation, such as listening to the radio and playing sports.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: When coaches develop activities for youth practices and when sport organizations design youth-sport programs, they must consider the implication of deliberate play and deliberate practice.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: You go ahead, and I'll catch up on some sports news while waiting.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Young children learning to play team sports are often told, ＂There is no I in team."
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Your lives are busy enough doing homework, playing sports, making friends, seeking after your dreams.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Youth sport has the potential to accomplish three important objectives in children's development.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: The only American public-sector workers who earn well above $250,000 a year are university sports coaches and the president of the United States.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: "If we were really bold, we might even begin to think of high-calorie fast food in the same way as cigarettes—by setting strict limits on advertising, product placement and sponsorship of sport events," he said.
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: But successive governments have presided over selling green spaces, squeezing money from local authorities and declining attention on sport in education.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Instead of wordy, worthy strategies, future governments need to do more to provide the conditions for sport to thrive.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Planning documents pledged that the great legacy of the Games would be to lever a nation of sport lovers away from their couches.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The number of adults doing weekly sport did rise, by nearly 2 million in the run-up to 2012—but the general population was growing faster.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The opposition claims primary school pupils doing at least two hours of sport a week have nearly halved.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: All over the world men and women, boys and girls enjoy sports.
sentences.cn: 全世界的男女老少都喜爱运动。

sentences.en: He played badminton for sport.
sentences.cn: 他打羽毛球是打着玩的。

sentences.en: They're going to have a sports meet very soon.
sentences.cn: 他们不久将开运动会。

炫耀, 给人看, 玩弄

sentences.en: He sports an ivory-handled cane these days.
sentences.cn: 这些天来, 他一直在炫耀一只象牙柄手杖。

sentences.en: He sported with her affection.
sentences.cn: 他玩弄她的感情。

sentences.en: Lambs sport in the field.
sentences.cn: 小羊在田里嬉戏。</seg>

lj.lj_ly: I have assumed the name was given more or less in sport.
lj.lj_ls: 我猜，取这个名字多少是出于寻开心。

entry.def: Sports are games such as football and basketball and other competitive leisure activities which need physical effort and skill.

example.ex: I'd say football is my favourite sport...
example.tran: 我最喜欢的运动要数足球了。

entry.def: If you say that someone is a sport or a good sport, you mean that they cope with a difficult situation or teasing in a cheerful way.

example.ex: He was accused of having no sense of humor, of not being a good sport.
example.tran: 他被指责缺乏幽默感，不够大度。

entry.def: If you say that someone sports something such as a distinctive item of clothing, you mean that they wear it without any shyness.

example.ex: He sported a collarless jacket with pleated black panels...
example.tran: 他穿着一件带有黑色褶子饰条的无领上衣。

example.ex: He was heavily-built and sported a red moustache...
example.tran: 他身材魁梧，留着红色的八字胡。

means.word_mean: 1. an active diversion requiring physical exertion and competition
2. the occupation of athletes who compete for pay
4. (biology) an organism that has characteristics resulting from chromosomal alteration
5. (Maine colloquial) temporary summer resident of inland Maine
6. verbal wit (often at another's expense but not to be taken seriously);
1. wear or display in an ostentatious or proud manner;

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'pastime, entertainment'): shortening of disport

sentences.cn: 相比之下,奥林匹克的投标者想要更多的人参与运动,并培养出更多的运动精英。
sentences.en: The Olympic bidders, by contrast, wanted to get more people doing sports and to produce more elite athletes.

sentences.cn: 但是历届政府却一直掌管着售卖绿地,压缩地方政府资金,拒绝重视教育领域的体育运动。

sentences.cn: 未来政府不是要制定冗长的,令人尊敬的策略,而是需要多干实事,为繁荣体育运动提供条件。
sentences.en: Instead of wordy, worthy strategies, future governments need to do more to provide the conditions for sport to thrive.

sentences.cn: 无论是一个运动团队或是一场总统竞选活动，其中的每个人都希望具有很大的动量，这让他们很难停下或改变方向。
sentences.en: Whether it ’ s a sports team or a  presidential campaign, everybody  relishes having the big momentum, because it makes them harder to stop or change direction.

sentences.cn: 二现在运动比赛已经结束, 德维尔夫人将颁奖.
sentences.en: Now that the sports competitions are over, Lady de Vere will present the prizes.

sentences.cn: 他告诉他们,冲浪已经不再是富裕的白种人的专属运动了.
sentences.en: He tells them it is not just a sport for white affluent people anymore.

sentences.cn: 乒乓球是1992年巴塞罗那奥运动会上被列入正式项目.
sentences.en: It became a full Olympic sport in 1992 at Bracelona.

sentences.cn: 在周四他和运动俱乐部的朋友们会面.
sentences.en: On Thursdays he meets his friends at the Sports Club.

sentences.cn: 针对具有一定规模的极限运动团体,SMP滑板公园设立了团体票.
sentences.en: SMP Skate Park has adopted group tickets for extreme sports groups with particular scale.

sentences.cn: 篮球运动已经有一百多年的历史了.
sentences.en: The sport of basketball is a little over a hundred years old.

sentences.cn: 你为什么选择篮球、足球这样的运动来进行训练 呢 ?
sentences.en: VS: Why do you take another sports like basketball and soccer for the training?

sentences.cn: 运动确实增加到我的日常生活的幸福.
sentences.en: Sports have really added happiness to my daily life.

sentences.cn: 然而, 我最喜欢的运动是打篮球.
sentences.en: However, my favorite sport is basketball.

sentences.cn: 游泳是夏季最好的运动项目之一.
sentences.en: Swimming is one of the best summer sports.

sentences.cn: 我最好的朋友买中国运动奖卷中了很多钱.
sentences.en: My best friend won a motza in the China Sports Lottery.

sentences.cn: 暑假前我才在规划说每天早上去附近的运动场晨跑.
sentences.en: I planned on juggling at the sports ground every morning before the summer vacation.

sentences.cn: 主要是来参加运动会, 我想也是为观光而来.
sentences.en: Mainly for the sports meet and also for sightseeing, I think.

sentences.cn: 猎鸟是为了乐趣.
sentences.en: Game birds are hunted for sport.

sentences.cn: 而美国人则很享受一边看比赛一边大吃大喝的乐趣.
sentences.en: Americans, on the other and munching while watching sports.

sentences.cn: 使用这种球开展毽球或羽毛球运动,能增加运动乐趣.
sentences.en: Sports pleasure can be enhanced via carrying on shuttlecock game or badminton game through the ball.

sentences.cn: 体育比赛的乐趣在于什么事都可能发生.
sentences.en: The joy of sporting contests is that anything can happen.

sentences.cn: 就技巧和乐趣而言,足球在我们的体育运动中占头等重要的地位.
sentences.en: For both skill and enjoyment football deserves pride of place among our sports.

sentences.cn: 舒适的设计理念,让中学生在这个秋季能够体验到运动的乐趣.
sentences.en: Juniors could enjoy in sport by the comfortable design this autumn.

sentences.cn: 老兄，你真行！
sentences.en: Good on you, sport!

sentences.cn: “ 克利普斯普林格会弹钢琴, ” 盖茨比打断了他的话说, “ 是不是, 艾温, 老兄? ”
sentences.en: " Klipspringer plays the piano,'said Gatsby , cutting him off . " Don't you , Ewing, old sport? "

sentences.cn: “ 不是, 老兄, 我没有.
sentences.en: " No, old sport, I'm not.

sentences.cn: “ 他们逮不住他, 老兄.
sentences.en: " They can't get him, old sport.

sentences.cn: “ 就在这儿站着, 老兄. ”
sentences.en: " Just standing here, old sport. "

sentences.cn: “ 我还以为你知道哩, 老兄.
sentences.en: " I thought you knew, old sport.

sentences.cn: “ 愿意跟我一块去吗, 老兄?
sentences.en: " Want to go with me, old sport?

sentences.cn: “ 我说, 老兄, ” 他出其不意地大声说, “ 你到底对我是怎么个看法? ”
sentences.en: " Look here , old sport, " he broke out surprisingly. " What's your opinion of me, anyhow? "

sentences.cn: “ 别放在心上, 老兄. ”
sentences.en: " Don't give it another thought, old sport. "

sentences.cn: “ 何必找她的碴呢, 老兄? ”
sentences.en: " Why not let her alone, old sport? "

sentences.cn: 来!老兄, 再喝一杯.
sentences.en: Come on, old sport, have another drink.

sentences.cn: “ 别跟我说这个, 老兄. ”
sentences.en: " Don't tell me, old sport. "

sentences.cn: 他很高兴赚几个钱, 老兄. ”
sentences.en: He was very glad to pick up some money, old sport. "

sentences.cn: “ 我不信任他, 老兄. ”
sentences.en: " I don't trust him, old sport. "

sentences.cn: 那是丹-科迪先生, 老兄. ”
sentences.en: That's Mr. Dan Cody, old sport. "

sentences.cn: “ 我说, 老兄, 你一定得替我找个人来.
sentences.en: " Look here , old sport, you've got to get somebody for me.

sentences.cn: “ 那你尽可以自便, 老兄. ”
sentences.en: " You can suit yourself about that, old sport. "

sentences.cn: “ 现在走开, 老兄? ”
sentences.en: " Go away NOW, old sport? "

sentences.cn: “ 你别叫我 ‘ 老兄 ’
sentences.en: " Don't you call me'old sport'! "

sentences.cn: 可是我们俩在那整个期间彼此相爱, 老兄, 而你却不知道.
sentences.en: But both of us loved each other all that time, old sport, and you didn't know.

sentences.cn: “ 后来就打仗了, 老兄.
sentences.en: " Then came the war, old sport.

sentences.cn: “ 哦, 哈罗, 老兄. ” 他说, 仿佛他有好多年没见过我了.
sentences.en: " Oh, hello, old sport, " he said, as if he hadn't seen me for years.

sentences.cn: “ 好了, 老兄. ” 盖茨比喊道.
sentences.en: " All right, old sport, " called Gatsby.

sentences.cn: 咱俩到康尼岛去玩吧, 老兄.
sentences.en: Let's go to Coney Island, old sport.

sentences.cn: “ 这车子很漂亮, 是不是, 老兄? ”
sentences.en: " It's pretty, isn't it, old sport? "

sentences.cn: “ 我在他家里不能说什么, 老兄. ”
sentences.en: " I can't say anything in his house, old sport. "

sentences.cn: 海豹正在水中嬉戏.
sentences.en: Seals are sporting about in the water.

sentences.cn: 湖面上鸭群在嬉戏.
sentences.en: Ducks are sporting on the lake.

sentences.cn: 夏天我喜欢站在海水里嬉戏.
sentences.en: I like to stand in seawater and sport in summer.

sentences.cn: 小羊在田里嬉戏.
sentences.en: Lambs sport in the field.

Sentence.sentence: Dog-fighting victims are tortured and killed for profit and "sport," yet their criminal abusers often receive a 28 minimal sentence for causing a lifetime of pain.
